speaker: Geralt
prev_text: Easily recognized. I'm proud of it, never thought to conceal it in any way.
en_text: From what I know, elves in Novigrad aren't exactly treated in a civil manner.
pl_text: Z tego co wiem, w Novigradzie elfy nie są zbyt dobrze traktowane.

speaker: Avallach
next_text: I'll not stop with his staff.
en_text: The ice… it's a spell. You must find the mage who cast it, destroy his staff.
pl_text: Ten lód... To zaklęcie. Musisz zniszczyć kostur czarodzieja, który je rzucił.

speaker: Geralt
next_text: Tis but the start. Real challenge awaits at the cave's end.
en_text: If there's one thing I'm not afraid of, it's nekkers.
pl_text: Czego jak czego, ale nekkerów to się akurat nie boję.

speaker: Geralt
prev_text: Shame to let such a lad waste away behind bars… Come on. Maybe Lugos'll try you today.
en_text: And they say violence is never the answer…
pl_text: A mówią, że przemoc nigdy nie jest rozwiązaniem...

speaker: Geralt
next_text: Someone walked through the spilled wine.
en_text: Wasn't them that attacked those people. Gotta be a royal wyvern hiding around here somewhere.
pl_text: To nie one zaatakowały tych ludzi. Wiwerna królewska musi gdzieś się tu czaić...
